name: Briscola Pro
description:
Briscola Pro is the ultimate app for all card game fans with over millions of users worldwide! IT'S YOUR TURN: Make the right move, download Briscola Pro now!

Play online, chat and make friends with real opponents from all over the world, challenge the most advanced AI and climb the world rankings!
PLAY BRISCOLA PRO:

- 2 or 4 PLAYERS matches: now you can choose to play against more opponents
- SINGLE PLAYER: Play against the most advanced AI
- MULTIPLAYER: Challenge your friends and random players from around the world via Game Center, WiFi and Bluetooth
- SCREEN ORIENTATION: now you can play in portrait and landscape mode on all your devices
- 4 LEVELS: Easy, Medium, Hard and Pro
- 6 LEADERBOARDS: Easy, Medium, Hard, Pro, Online and General
- ACHIEVEMENTS: Collect them all
- CUSTOM GAME TABLE: fantastic HD themes and cards
